title: E-commerce platforms free from filing tax on vendor behalf
dc:creator: Retail Asia
description:
read the original version on: www.retailnews.asia

E-commerce platforms like Shopee, Tiki or Lazada will not have to file tax on vendorsâ€™ behalf and instead only provide authorities with their revenue and other details. Every quarter the platforms will need to submit vendor details including name, tax ID, personal ID, address, phone number and revenue, according to a new decree. This means […]
